Description: On November 30, 2009, the U.S. Department of Energy Office of Health, Safety and Security's Office of Enforcement issued a Consent Order to Brookhaven Science Associates for deficiencies in work control that led to the October 13, 2008, propane gas explosion that destroyed a well house at DOE's Brookhaven National Laboratory.  The contractor agreed to the Consent Order.
Ownership Structure: joint venture (owned 50-50 by Battelle and Stonybrook University)

Description: On August 29, 2013, the U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) Office of Health, Safety and Security's Office of Enforcement and Oversight issued a Preliminary Notice of Violation (WEA-2013-01) to Brookhaven Science Associates, LLC for violations of 10 C.F.R. 851 associated with a fall injury event that occurred in Building 701 at the Brookhaven National Laboratory. Penalty took the form of a contract fee reduction.
Ownership Structure: joint venture (owned 50-50 by Battelle and Stonybrook University)
joint venture (owned 50-50 by Battelle and Stonybrook University)
Info Source: Included in a dataset downloaded at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_summary.php
Notes: Company is plan administrator. Penalty amount reported in range of $50,001 to $100,000.

Description: On November 23, 2015, the U.S. Department of Energy Office of Enterprise Assessments' Office of Enforcement issued a Consent Order (WCO-2015-02) to Brookhaven Science Associates, LLC, relating to an electrical shock suffered by a subcontractor while working at the 220-foot level of a meteorological tower at DOE's Brookhaven National Laboratory.
Ownership Structure: joint venture (owned 50-50 by Battelle and Stonybrook University)
